paragraphs.zh-tw: 伊莎朵拉·鄧肯，（音樂）瘋狂的長腿女人，來自舊金山，厭倦了美國，想離開這裡。伊莎朵拉 1908 年左右，在某地因自己搭建的藍色幕布而成名，她那樣站著，雙手放在心窩，然後她等待，然後她等待，接著，她就開始舞動。
paragraphs.en: Isadora Duncan -- (Music) -- crazy, long-legged womanfrom San Francisco, got tired of this country,and she wanted to get out. Isadora was famoussomewhere around 1908 for putting up a blue curtain, and she would stand with her hands over her solar plexus and she would wait, and she would wait, and then, she would move.

paragraphs.zh-tw: （音樂）約書亞、我和蘇米，稱這件作品為《紅圓圈與藍布幕》。紅圓圈。藍布幕。
paragraphs.en: (Music) Josh and I and Somi call this piece "The Red Circle and the Blue Curtain." Red circle. Blue curtain.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 然而，這可不是二十世紀初，而是 2015 年在溫哥華的一個早晨。
paragraphs.en: But, this is not the beginningof the 20th century. This is a morning in Vancouver in 2015.

paragraphs.zh-tw: （音樂）（歌聲）約書亞，來吧！（音樂）（歌聲）喝！我們結束了嗎？我想還沒。嘿！耶！（音樂）現在幾點了？（音樂）我們到哪了？約書亞。
paragraphs.en: (Music) (Singing) Come on, Josh! (Music) (Singing) Go! Are we there yet? I don't think so. Hey, yeah! (Music) What time is it? (Music) Where are we? Josh.

title: Bill T Jones The Dancer The Singer The Cellist And A Moment Of Creative Magic
